name: GcloudRunner
description: Execute gcloud commands to manage resources on Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
author: laurensknoll@binx.io

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The gcloud command to execute. For example, to execute 'gcloud run deploy', enter 'run deploy'

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional arguments to the selected command. For example, to specify the project of the gcloud command add '--project project-id'

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The working directory where the command will run. When empty, the root of the repository (for builds) or artifacts (for releases) is used, which is the value of '$(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)'.
